Class UIController

java.lang.Object
logic.UIController
public class UIController extends Object
Controller for managing all user interface views.

  • Method Details

    • changeView

      public void changeView(JFrame oldView, JFrame newView)
      Changes the visible view from one JFrame to another.
      Parameters:
      oldView - the current JFrame to hide
      newView - the new JFrame to show

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Controller controller)
      Initializes all UI screens and links them with the main controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - the main Controller object that manages logic and data
